EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Full Agenda 9-4-18 Germany, Austria, Switze
EmailTemplate.subject: IT’S ALIVE! SpringOne Platform Main Stage Speakers + Full Agenda Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name}} {{lead.Last Name}}, Complete 2018 Agenda is Now Available Chart a new way forward and learn how to build transformational software at SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>! Collaborate and share knowledge with other cloud experts from leading software companies at the conference designed especially for people like you—those who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software. This year’s event is taking place in Washington, D.C., from September 24–27, and includes 150+ sessions, more than 20 main stage speakers, onsite training, and networking opportunities across several events. Check out our recently finalized conference agenda <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/agenda?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> and sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> to see everything in store at this year’s SpringOne Platform. Your conference pass also gives you access to a number of conference extras, including our third annual Apache Geode™ Summit <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/geode?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>, agile meetings at Open Space <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/open-space?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>, a whole-lot-of-fun Lightning Talks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/lightning-talks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>, and several hands-on workshops <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/agenda#monday]]>. > REGISTER TODAY <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select]]> Hear from Main Stage speakers: <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/ted-colbert]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/jenny-zhang]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/oliver-gierke]]>
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/lauren-knausenberger]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/juergen-hoeller]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/olga-kundzich]]>
And many more!
View full agenda <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/agenda?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> and register <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select]]> today!
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
